text: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

translation.en: And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy
translation.id: Dan mereka diberi petunjuk kepada ucapan-ucapan yang baik dan diberi petunjuk (pula) kepada jalan (Allah) yang maha terpuji
